revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Wayward Cave |image = [[File:Wayward Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Wayward Cave. |tokens = 56,500 |location = On Route 206, south of Eterna City. }} '''Wayward Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 903,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat ||[[File:Mountain_Men.png|40px]] Mountain Men Reginald & Lorenzo || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | rowspan=2| [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Siblings.png|40px]] Siblings Cassidy & Wayne || [[File:Buneary.png|40px]] Buneary, [[File:Staravia.png|40px]] Staravia, [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta, [[File:Shellos_(west).png|40px]] Shellos (west) |- | |[[File:Nature_Friends.png|40px]] Nature Friends Tori & Diego || [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck, [[File:Aipom.png|40px]] Aipom |- | rowspan=2| [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix || [[File:Nature_Friends.png|40px]] Nature Friends Ana & Parker || [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot, [[File:Buizel.png|40px]] Buizel, [[File:Shinx.png|40px]] Shinx |- | [[File:Amateur_Archaeologists.png|40px]] Amateur Archaeologists Terry & Gerald || [[File:Gible.png|40px]] Gible, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor |- |}
